text: Hey <@U05GUA1K3U1>, thanks for sharing your experience! At what time did you first see the event appear on the CRM timeline? Curious to learn more.

Hi <@U05H3C4GDMX>,
The events sometime on 11th of july, between 15:15 - 15:45 CEST.
I didn't write down the exact time though, unfortunately.
Thanks for the quick answer! That seems like an 8h delay, let me look into it.
Did you start sending additional events and could reproduce this delay?
Every event I've tried creating since, have appeared instantly, so I'm not able to reproduce the issue
Good to know, thanks for sharing

Hi <@U04HWATMT7A> curious to learn more about your use case. What kind of information do your timeline events represent? Have you considered using <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/analytics-tools/create-codeless-custom-behavioral-events|CBEs> in your evaluation of the data / API setup?

<@U02E6LPLW72> I know your message was from a long time ago but I am curious to learn more about your use case of updating an existing event. What information would you like to update and why?

Thanks!
Hey Mark, I am creating an SMS connector which handles incoming messages from contacts. It would be great to have a report on who has replied and some other information

Hello everyone, I'm rather new to HubSpot but have played around with multiple things. I'm trying to build a public app. I have followed the authentication with Oauth as part of the "Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations" course and it is working, meaning I can install an app on a given account.
However now Im rather lost on what to do next for a functional app. I know you can create custom workflow actions but how exactly do I connect them to my app? How can I create a bidirectional sync between platforms? I know there are webhooks you can set up on public app, but to be honest I dont know where to place the code that executes when that worfkflow is triggered.
<@U043XV865GW> curious to learn whether you figured out how to get this information onto the timeline (potentially with the help of MailShake).

hi team....Does anyone know what the new endpoint in v3 or v4 is for the legacy one?

Legacy : <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/deals/get_deals_modified> (this one is in v1)
Interesting! Have you considered using CBEs for measuring analytics like replies?
(Just because CBEs are already available in reporting tools)
I believe I have found the way to create a custom workflow action with the "*/automation/v4/actions/{appId}" endpoint*
I'll have a look thanks Marc

<@U05GUA1K3U1> could you share your app id, portal id and contact you tried to add the event to? This way we can investigate more. Feel free to share these slightly sensitive information in a direct message. Thank you!
crm/v3/objects/deals/search and filter by hs_lastmodifieddate
Same here, had to switch to batch replace.

I’ve for looped the update row but obviously not ideal. (but I don’t want to risk overwriting one of the columns if HubSpot decide to break a different API)

I’ve had a support ticket open for 2 days now where they keep coming back saying they fixed… clearly not
Hello! Is there a way to change the payload type on a webhook via Automation? I need to adjust and select the payload type to be a form instead of JSON, any help is appreciated!

Hi Team,
Is there any API which can provide activities performed on company, contact, deals?
TIA for any  help or suggestions
We fixed the issue with the batch update endpoint just before 30 mins. Can you confirm if this is working now?
cc <@U04JAPYCD8W>

Can you give me some examples of activity data?

(From my experience, activities can mean different things to different people)
